definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch" inline="false"><field name="tries">10</field><field name="xzSpread">7</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to place up to 10 cactus columns</comment><value name="feature"><block type="placed_feature_inline"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We use the extra placement to make sure that the cacti only generate in valid spots</comment><value name="feature"><block type="feature_block_column_simple" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This represents a single cactus column</comment><value name="height"><block type="int_provider_biased_to_bottom"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">3</field></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CACTUS</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="placement"><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We check if each column is at a valid place</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_would_survive"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CACTUS</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">10</field><comment pinned="false" h="129" w="182">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. If this condition isn't passed, the feature won't be placed</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block or liquid</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_in_square" x="33" y="440"></block></xml>
